He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

The lacerators cut themselves before each hunt. They must feed before the sun rises or bleed to death.

When Mesmeric Fiend enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. When Mesmeric Fiend leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.
